name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halloween Horror Pumpkin Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace Halloween with Horror Pumpkin! This extension transforms your new tab into a chilling scene with a haunting pumpkin design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the spooky spirit with Halloween Horror Pumpkin! This Chrome extension transforms your new tab into a chilling Halloween scene featuring a haunting pumpkin design.

The Halloween Horror Pumpkin live wallpaper brings an eerie atmosphere with a creepy, carved pumpkin that sets the perfect Halloween vibe. Combining horror-inspired visuals with useful tools, itâ€™s ideal for the Halloween season and beyond.

Browse the web effortlessly with the Google search bar, organize favorite sites with customizable shortcuts, and keep an eye on the clock with a date display.

Key Features:

Live Wallpaper featuring a creepy Halloween Pumpkin
Google Search Bar for easy browsing
Customizable site shortcuts for fast access
Clock-Date display to stay on track

Add a spine-tingling twist to your browsing with Halloween Horror Pumpkin! Check out Gameograf.com for more thrilling themes to personalize your new tab.
